descriptions:
The mist emanating from their foreheads
is packed with the dreams of people
and Pokémon.

With the mist from its forehead,
it can create shapes of things
from dreams it has eaten.

The dream mist coming from its forehead
changes into many different colors
depending on the dream that was eaten.

The dream mist coming from its forehead
changes into many different colors
depending on the dream that was eaten.

The mist emanating from their foreheads is packed
with the dreams of people and Pokémon.

The dream mist coming from its forehead changes
into many different colors depending on the dream
that was eaten.

The mist emanating from their foreheads is packed
with the dreams of people and Pokémon.

The dream mist coming from its forehead changes
into many different colors depending on the dream
that was eaten.

When dark mists emanate from its body, don’t
get too near. If you do, your nightmares will
become reality.

It drowses and dreams all the time. It’s best to
leave it be if it’s just woken up, as it’s a terrible
grump when freshly roused from sleep.
name: Musharna
